# Create Account

Create smart accounts for your users with customizable options.

## Basic account creation

Accounts are created automatically when users authenticate with Privy:

```typescript
import { useSmartWallet } from '@varity-labs/ui-kit';

function AccountInfo() {
  const { account, getAddress, isConnected, isDeployed, deployWallet } = useSmartWallet();

  if (!isConnected) {
    return <p>Please log in first</p>;
  }

  if (!isDeployed) {
    return (
      <button onClick={deployWallet}>
        Activate Smart Account
      </button>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Account Address: {getAddress()}</p>
      <p>Status: Active</p>
    </div>
  );
}
```

:::note[Automatic Activation]
Smart accounts are activated only when needed (on first operation). This saves resources.
:::

## Check account status

```typescript
import { useSmartWallet } from '@varity-labs/ui-kit';

function AccountStatus() {
  const {
    isConnected,    // Account connection status
    isDeployed,     // Is account activated?
    isGasless,      // Are free operations enabled?
    getAddress,     // Get account address
  } = useSmartWallet();

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Connected: {isConnected ? 'Yes' : 'No'}</p>
      <p>Activated: {isDeployed ? 'Yes' : 'Not yet'}</p>
      <p>Free operations: {isGasless ? 'Enabled' : 'Disabled'}</p>
      {isConnected && <p>Address: {getAddress()}</p>}
    </div>
  );
}
```

## Smart account features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Free operations** | All usage fees paid by Varity platform |
| **Auto-activate** | Activated on first operation (not on creation) |
| **Smart accounts** | Enhanced security with programmable features |
| **Batch operations** | Send multiple operations at once |
| **Session keys** | Delegate specific permissions (coming soon) |

- [Session Keys](/build/wallets/session-keys) -- Enable batch operations
- [Free Operations](/build/payments/gasless) -- Sponsor fees for users
